textfooter: C-deg offers tailored solutions for the adequate and environmentally friendly treatment of all types of greenhouse gases.
name: Full name
textcomment: You must belong to this winery or be an administrator
successcreate: It was created correctly, with the barcode:
fieldsnull: empty fields or the product already exists

text1seep: To edit or move the product, just assign the new value of the field by clicking and typing and/or select the desired value, then press 'SAVE'.
text2seep: Additional buttons allow to delete, redirect to comments, close tab
usernotware: The user does not belong to the destination warehouse

existprod: The product already exists in the destination warehouse

youcanedit: You can edit a single field or both.
fieldexceeds: Field empty or exceeds allowed characters
unitsquantity: Enter the existing units of the product

enterpricev: Enter the sale price for this unit
enterpricec: Enter the purchase price of this unit
entersection: Enter location section following the example
textinfo: Here you can add a product that already exists in the database to your work warehouse.
enterpassword: Incorrect password. Must be 8 to 16 characters long, include at least one digit, one uppercase letter and one lowercase.
textinfotwo: A user with a special role can choose their functions and routes within the web application autonomously.
enternameware: Enter the name of the winery following the example
firstsearch: You must first search for a user in order to update
textedition: To edit, enter the values you want to modify and then save the changes.
texttotaltransfer: Select the warehouse where you want to transfer
textparcialtransfer: To move a product, first select the destination warehouse, then assign and/or select the corresponding values.

notinternet: Check your internet connection, it was not possible to convert between currencies
entervalueyoungolder: Enter a value less than or equal to the available units
textregistration: The transfer is incorrect when it comes to the same warehouse of origin and destination
